title: Tokai Love-Rock LS-136F ZB Japan in Anaconda Burst
description: Japanese craftsmanship meets vintage tone. Flame maple top with mahogany body, ZB pickups for authentic PAF sound. Limited edition Anaconda Burst finish.

title: Gibson 1958 Les Paul Standard, Sunburst-Slash of Guns N' Roses
description: Historic '58 reissue with Slash's signature modifications. Lightweight mahogany body, uncovered Custombucker pickups. Includes certificate of authenticity.

title: Les Paul Standard 50s Plain Top, Tobacco Burst
description: VOS-aged finish, 50s neck profile. Burstbucker 1 & 2 pickups with CTS pots. Original hardshell case included.

title: Fender Stratocaster® NOS Vintage Custom 1955, Maple Fingerboard, Wide-Fade 2-Color Sunburst
description: Master-built recreation of '55 specs. Soft V neck, 7.25" radius, hand-wound single-coils. New Old Stock condition.

title: ESP Ltd EC1000T, Black Natural Burst
description: Thin U-shaped neck with 24 XJ frets. Fishman Fluence Modern pickups, set-thru construction. Stage-ready rock machine.

title: Gretsch G2210 Streamliner Junior Jet Club
description: Compact hollow-body with Broad'Tron pickups. Midnight Sapphire finish, 12" radius ebony fretboard. Perfect for blues/jazz.

title: Ibanez Semi-Hollow-Body Guitar AMV10A
description: Artcore Vintage series with Super 58 Custom pickups. Violin finish over nyatoh body. Floating tremolo system.

title: Martin D-35 Acoustic Guitar
description: Legendary dreadnought with 3-piece rosewood back. Sitka spruce top, scalloped X-bracing. 1960s vintage restoration.

title: Les Paul Endémique - made de Luthier (French)
description: Custom French luthier build with carved limba body. Bare Knuckle Riff Raff pickups, multi-scale 25.5-24.75" neck.

title: Favier - Duraré Macassar ebony
description: Bespoke Italian design with Macassar ebony top. Dual P90 configuration, compound radius fingerboard. Only 12 made worldwide.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: All-original '65 with small pickguard. Patent Number humbuckers, lyre vibrola. Collector-grade condition.

title: Fender Stratocaster Olympic white
description: Custom Shop '60s Relic. Roasted maple neck, Lollar Blackface pickups. Light aging with nitrocellulose finish.

title: PRS SE Custom 24 Flamed Red Burst
description: 10-top flame maple veneer. 85/15 S pickups, pattern thin neck. With PRS SE hardshell case.

title: Fender Telecaster American Professional II
description: Deep C neck profile, V-Mod II pickups. Mystic Surf Green finish. Includes Fender tweed case.

title: Fender Telecaster 1952
description: NOCaster reissue with ash body. Twisted Tele pickup configuration, 7.25" radius neck. Relic'd to heavy wear specs.
